text: Bruce Robinson (born 2 May 1946) is an English director, screenwriter, novelist and actor. He wrote and directed the cult classic Withnail and I (1987). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:BAFTA Award winning writers Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:English novelists Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from London Category:Movie directors from London Category:Screenwriters from London
title: Bruce Robinson
